### **Overview:** Using 


```{r}
# Read in plastics data
food_groups_pca <- read_csv(here("data", "usda_nutrients.csv")) %>%
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(energy_kcal, ends_with("_g")) %>% 
  scale() %>% 
  prcomp()

food_groups_pca$restoration

food_groups_complete <- read_csv(here("data", "usda_nutrients.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() 

autoplot(food_groups_pca,
         data = food_groups_complete,
         colour = 'food_group',
         loadings = TRUE,
         loadings.label = TRUE,
         loadings.colour = "black",
         loadings.label.colour = "black",
         alpha = .3) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position = 'none') 
  
  
```
